manager
Class UtilityManager

java.lang.Object
  manager.UtilityManager

public class UtilityManager
extends java.lang.Object

Initiates the RS485 Connection and the Bluetooth Connection to the server. It will set the appropriate match parameters in Settings

It will also initialize the appropriate NXTRemoteMotor motors and sets them in Settings
